env.description: Extra env vars to pass to the `vector` container.

existingConfigMap.description: Set this to non-empty value to use existing `ConfigMap` for `vector`, instead of using a generated one.

extraConfigDirSources.description: Additional sources to include at the `config-dir` projection of the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

extraContainersPorts.description: Additional container ports to pass to the `vector` container of the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

extraVolumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts to pass to the `vector` container of the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

extraVolumes.description: Additional volumes to pass to the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

fullnameOverride.description: Override the full chart name (name prefixed with release name) used in templates.

globalOptions.description: Global parts of the generated `vector` config.

dataDir.description: Specifies the (in-container) data dir used by `vector`.

tag.description: Overrides the image tag, the default is `{image.version}-{image.base}`.

version.description: Overrides the image version, the default is the Chart appVersion.

imagePullSecrets.description: Image pull secrets to use at the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

internalMetricsSource.description: The 'built-in' internal metrics source emitting Vector's internal operational metrics.

config.description: Additional config to embed at the internal metrics source.

enabled.description: Disable to omit the internal metrics source from being added.

rawConfig.description: (DEPRECATED) Raw TOML config to embed at the internal metrics source.

sourceId.description: The name to use for the 'built-in' host metrics source.

logSchema.description: Schema portion of the generated `vector` config.

nameOverride.description: Override the chart name used in templates.

podAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

podLabels.description: Labels to add to the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

podRollmeAnnotation.description: Add an annotation to the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet` with a random value, generated at Helm Chart template evaluation time. Enabling this will cause the `Pod`s to be recreated every time the value changes - effectively restarting them on each update.

podSecurityContext.description: PodSecurityContext to set at the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

podValuesChecksumAnnotation.description: Add an annotation to the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet` with a checksum of the Helm release values (as in `values.yaml` content and `--set` flags). Enabling this will cause the `Pod`s to be recreated every time values change.

prometheusSink.description: The 'built-in' prometheus sink exposing metrics in the Prometheus scraping format. When using this 'built-in' sink, we automatically configure container ports, and ensure things are ready for discovery and scraping via Prometheus' `kubernetes_sd_configs` jobs.

addPodAnnotations.description: Add Prometheus annotations to Pod to opt-in for Prometheus scraping. To be used in clusters that rely on Pod annotations in the form of `prometheus.io/scrape` to discover scrape targets.

config.description: Additional config to embed at the prometheus sink.

enabled.description: Disable to omit the prometheus sink from being added.

excludeInternalMetrics.description: Set this to `true` to opt-out from automatically adding the built-in internal metrics source to the inputs.

inputs.description: Inputs of the built-in prometheus sink. If you have built-in internal metrics source enabled, we'll add it as a input here under the hood, so you don't have to pass it here. Unless `excludeInternalMetrics` is set to `true`, in which case you're responsible of wiring up the internal metrics.

podMonitor.description: Use prometheus-operator `PodMonitor` to opt-in for Prometheus scraping. To be used in clusters that rely on prometheus-operator to gether metrics. You might want to set `podMonitorSelectorNilUsesHelmValues=false` if you're using prometheus-operator Helm chart to allow `PodMonitor` resources discovery in all namespaces.

enabled.description: Whether to add the `PodMonitor` resource or not. `prometheus-operator` CRDs are necessary, otherwise you'll get an error.

extraRelabelings.description: Additional relabelings to include in the `PodMonitor`.

rawConfig.description: (DEPRECATED) Raw TOML config to embed at the prometheus sink.

sinkId.description: The name to use for the 'built-in' prometheus sink.

securityContext.description: Security context to set at the `vector` container at the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

service.description: Configuration for both regular and headless `Service`.

ports.description: Service type - defaults to `ClusterIP` (only relevant for the regular service).

type.description: Service type - defaults to `ClusterIP` (only relevant for the regular service).

serviceAccount.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account.

create.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created.

name.description: The name of the service account to use. If not set and `create` is true, a name is generated using the `fullname` template.

sinks.description: Sinks to add to the generated `vector` config.

sources.description: Sources to add to the generated `vector` config (besides 'built-in' kubernetes logs source).

hostPath.description: Absolute path on the host to store `vector` data. If `mode` is set to anything other than `hostPath` has no effect.

managedPersistentVolumeClaim.description: Create `PersistentVolumeClaim` via the `volumeClaimTemplates` of the `StatefulSet` to store `vector` data. If `mode` is set to anything other than `managedPersistentVolumeClaim` has no effect.

annotations.description: Additional annotations to apply to the created `PersistentVolumeClaim`.

labels.description: Additional labels to apply to the created `PersistentVolumeClaim`.

storageClass.description: If defined, then `storageClassName: <storageClass>`. If set to '-', then `storageClassName: ""`, which disables dynamic provisioning. If undefined or empty (default), then no `storageClassName` spec is set, so the default provisioner will be chosen (gp2 on AWS, standard on GKE, AWS & OpenStack).

mode.description: The storage mode to use to store `vector` data.

tolerations.description: Tolerations to set for the `Pod`s managed by `StatefulSet`.

items.description: This toleration is to have the `StatefulSet` runnable on master nodes. Remove it if your masters can't run pods.

transforms.description: Transforms to add to the generated `vector` config.

vectorApi.description: The Vector API. Will be disabled by default.

enabled.description: Turn the Vector API on or off.

playground.description: Enable or disable the built-in GraphQL Playground (a web IDE for working on GraphQL queries).

vectorSource.description: The 'built-in' vector source, for accepting logs from the vector agents. Will be added by default, unless explicitly disabled.

config.description: Additional config to embed at the vector source.

enabled.description: Disable to omit the vector source from being added.

nodePort.description: Specific node port to bind (useful if `service.type` is set to `NodePort`).

rawConfig.description: (DEPRECATED) Raw TOML config to embed at the internal metrics source.

sourceId.description: The name to use for the 'built-in' internal metrics source.
